paper.title: The Portfolio Heuristic Optimisation System (PHOS)
paper.abstract: The efficient representation of the accurate corporate value on the stock price is vital to investors and fund managers that desire to optimise the net worth of the overall stock portfolio. Although the efficient market hypothesis sets limits, the practice of markets is an ideal place of manipulation, and corruption on prices. The accounting statements, evaluated by support vector machines and the SVM hybrids under genetic algorithms provide superiority in portfolio selection, on condition. A specific genetic hybrid SVM outperformed all examined SVM models being a powerful tool in financial analysis. We also offer the integrated model of portfolio selection, PHOS.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用支持向量机（SVM）和遗传算法优化投资组合选择，旨在提高股票投资组合的净值，这直接属于投资组合管理的范畴。
